fsdLink

fsdLinkfeature structure declaration link associates the name of a typed feature structure with a feature structure declaration for it.
Moduleiso-fs â€” Feature structures
Attributes
  • att.global ( @xml:id, @n, @xml:lang, @xml:base, @xml:space ) (att.global.rendition ( @rend, @style, @rendition ) ) (att.global.linking ( @corresp, @synch, @sameAs, @copyOf, @next, @prev, @exclude, @select ) ) (att.global.analytic ( @ana ) ) (att.global.facs ( @facs ) ) (att.global.change ( @change ) ) (att.global.responsibility ( @cert, @resp ) ) (att.global.source ( @source ) )
    • @type
    identifies the type of feature structure to be documented; this will be the value of the type attribute on at least one feature structure.
    Usage
    req
    Datatype
    teidata.enumerated
    @target
    supplies a pointer to a feature structure declaration (fsDecl) element within the current document or elsewhere.
    Usage
    req
    Datatype
    teidata.pointer
    Member ofmodel.fsdDeclPart
